import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Task } from 'src/Models/Task'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-task', templateUrl: './create-task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-task.component.css'] }) export class CreateTaskComponent { @Output() CloseForm: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); @Output() EmitTaskData:EventEmitter=new EventEmitter(); OnCloseForm(){ this.CloseForm.emit(false); } OnFormSubmitted(form:NgForm){ this.EmitTaskData.emit(form.value); this.CloseForm.emit(false); } }

'Create a new Task
